--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Wildrider keeps pulling stuff out, then takes a second to wipe his 
brow.
> "It will be kind of hard to show them to Megatron right now." he 
said,
> nonchallantly. He then pointed over to charred bushes, ripped up 
earth,
> and craters in the ground. Between all the destruction, Megatron was
> seen, locked in conflict with another robot. Wildrider looks for a
> second, then gets back to work of clearing out. "You know if you
> Terrorcons aren't busy you can help." He says, to the two loafing 
robots
> near the base. 
> 
> "Sinnertwin not want to help." groaned the Yellow one, as he looked 
to
> Rippersnapper.


::BLINDCHAOS AND DOMNIJOE::

    Blindchaos went right ahead and helped Wildrider unload 
Astrotrian. Domnijoe tried not to get too annoyed with him. It was
his 
infernal smile again. Normally bots didn't annoy her this much, but 
most bots didn't smile ALL THE TIME. She grunted as she began 
unloading the metal, piling it away where people it could be easily
be 
accessed.
   "I don't mind loafers" She said calmly. "I just wait for a chance 
to snack on 'em later"
    "Aww..'com'on, 'Joe." Blindchaos griped, humor colouring his 
voice. "Torture is my specialty."
    Domnijoe snorted, disgusted.
    "You do it to me all the time with that damn smile of yours. GET 
RID OF IT."
    Blindchaos pouted.
    "Alright. For the rest of today. But I ain't gonna get rid of it 
perminantly." He winked at his companion suggestively and absorbed 
himself back into his work.
    Domnijoe could only sigh.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

****************
